name: Un-Forgor
description:
This is my first proper game and I am a young game dev, so it may be possible there are many bugs. Moreover this game while in a "Finished" state has plenty of room to expand on, however as I will soon be entering the army after publishing this game, there will be little time left to develop the game/ fix bugs over the next two years. I apologize in advance for any bugs I can't fix immediately as well as the incredibly small scale game and poor quality art assets.

Additionally, if you want to see this game expanded on, this google form can allow you to add your own suggestions which I can tap on in the future.

Disclaimer

I am an independent developer, not affiliated with Cover Corp or any Hololive organizations. This free game is a derivative work of Cover Corp.'s Hololive property. It is not endorsed nor affiliated with the previously mentioned organizations.
